name: Hunted Demon’s Forge
description: Set in a dark and foreboding fantasy world, Hunted: The Demon’s Forge is an unforgettable co-op fantasy action game that pits you against waves of enemies. Not only will you need to use a range of weapons in cover combat to fight and slash your way through underground dungeons and sweeping vistas.  You will also need your wits about you to complete puzzles and explore the world to find the answers to the game’s deep, dark mysteries.
